name: Moor
description:
A long forgotten kingdom located in the mountain of Moor was sealed off a long time ago, but noone really knows why. Join a small group of explorers in the quest to discover what really happend beyond the moutain walls.

Moor is a first person permadeath randomly generated dungeon crawler with pixelated graphics.
Enter the mountain of Moor and delve down into an ancient kingdom and discover what happend to it.
Fight monsters and bosses. Solve puzzles, unveil secrets and avoid traps to gather fine loot and level up as you delve deeper into the mountain.
